snippet: The Rio de Janeiro police said Tuesday they were investigating a new claim of rape against three men arrested in connection with the rape of an American student in a transit van.
abstract: Rio de Janeiro police say they are investigating new accusation of rape against three men arrested in connection with gang rape of American student in transit van; in newest case, victim says she was raped during Carnival holiday in February.
lead_paragraph: The Rio de Janeiro police said Tuesday they were investigating a new claim of rape against three men arrested in connection with the rape of an American student in a transit van.

headline.seo: Brazil: Suspects in Gang Rape Linked to Assaults and Robberies
headline.main: Brazil: Suspects in Gang Rape Linked to Assaults and Robberies
headline.print_headline: Brazil: Suspects in Gang Rape Linked to Assaults and Robberies
